fields.name: Lunar Gateway Express
fields.description: A quick 3-day journey to the Moon and back. Perfect for first-time space travelers. Includes one full day on the lunar surface with guided tours of the Apollo 11 landing site.

fields.name: Mars Pioneer
fields.description: Two-week expedition to the Red Planet. Explore Olympus Mons, Valles Marineris, and the polar ice caps. Includes stopover at the Moon for acclimatization.

fields.name: Jovian Moons Tour
fields.description: Three-week journey exploring Jupiter's fascinating moons. Visit Europa's ice geysers and subsurface ocean research station. Witness Jupiter's Great Red Spot from orbit.

fields.name: Saturn Grand Tour
fields.description: Four-week expedition to Saturn's ring system and moons. Cruise Titan's methane seas, witness Enceladus' ice geysers, and enjoy spectacular views of Saturn's rings.

fields.name: Outer Solar System Expedition
fields.description: Ultimate six-week journey to the edge of our solar system. Visit all major destinations from Moon to Pluto. Only for experienced space travelers. Limited to 20 passengers.

fields.name: Ice Moons Explorer
fields.description: Specialized three-week tour focusing on the icy moons of the outer planets. Visit Europa, Enceladus, and Titan. Perfect for astrobiology enthusiasts.
